    BulkResources<VcenterRestRep>, Resources<VcenterRestRep>, TaskResources<VcenterRestRep>, TenantResources<VcenterRestRep>

    public class Vcenters
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<VcenterRestRep>
implements TenantResources<VcenterRestRep>, TaskResources<VcenterRestRep>
    Vcenters resources.

    Base URL: /compute/vcenters

      • deactivate

        public Task<VcenterRestRep> deactivate(java.net.URI id,
                                       boolean detachStorage)
        Deactivates a vCenter.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenters/{id}/deactivate?detach-storage={detachStorage}

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the vCenter to deactivate.
        detachStorage - if true, will first detach storage.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

      • detachStorage

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenters/{id}/detach-storage

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the host.
        Returns:
        a task for monitoring the progress of the operation.

        public Task<VcenterRestRep> create(VcenterCreateParam input,
                                   java.lang.Boolean validateConnection,
                                   java.lang.Boolean discoverVcenter)
        Creates the vCenter.

        API Call: POST /compute/vcenters/

        Parameters:
        input - vCenter create payload.
        validateConnection - flag to indicate whether to validate the vCenter connection or not.
        Returns:
        the vCenter discovery async task.

      • updateAcls

        API Call: PUT /compute/vcenters/{id}/acl

        Parameters:
        input - vCenter create payload.
        input - acl assignment changes to update in the vCenter.
        Returns:
        the vCenter discovery async task.

      • getVcenters

        Parameters:
